text: Aug 12 Canadas main stock index opened flat on Thursday, as optimism over strong corporate earnings was offset by a drop in oil prices on concerns the spread of the Delta coronavirus variant would dampen the recovery of global fuel demand.* At 9:30 a.m. ET (13:30 GMT), the Toronto Stock Exchanges S&P/TSX composite index was down 4.89 points, or 0.02%, at 20,549.12.
